trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo"></xref> objects that are associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo"></xref>相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ThumbButtonInfoCollection is a strongly-typed <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> that is used to support declarations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ThumbButtonInfoCollection 是強型別<xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>，用來支援宣告[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] shell allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar preview.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)]殼層在工作列預覽允許最多七個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If more than seven <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo> objects are added to the ThumbButtonInfoCollection, the additional objects are treated as overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過七<xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo>物件加入至 ThumbButtonInfoCollection，其他的物件會被視為溢位。</xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo>

trans-unit.source: When a button is <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Visibility>，它並沒有任何可見的項目，且沒有空間保留它。</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: In this case, additional buttons from the ThumbButtonInfoCollection overflow are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會顯示其他 ThumbButtonInfoCollection 溢位按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立集合的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new instance of the collection.
